registration.description:
Registration of participants will begin on Tuesday April 23rd, from 8:00 am in the entrance hall.

For registration it is mandatory to carry the Eventbrite ticket.
registration.title: Gates open / Registration

lunch.description:
Fooooood! 🍔
The best time to talk with speakers and attendees
lunch.title: Lunch

party.description:
Let’s talk and drink! 🎉 From 19:00, come for chat, networking, drinks and food! 😎
The Makers Party will be held in "Café Oz Denfert"
This is a large venue with australian beers and bar meals just at 10 minutes in transport from the conference venue, at Denfert Rochereau

Directions

Address: 3 Place Denfert-Rochereau, 75014 Paris
M ° Denfert-Rochereau, M ° Raspail (lines 4, 6)
Just take the Metro 4 to Denfert
https://goo.gl/maps/sC5kxJrWfhQ2

Attention no more metro 4 after 22h, but there is the bus 68 until 1h that makes the trip Denfert -> Montrouge
And there is the RER C to get in the center of Paris

Infos

The locker room will be free from 19h to 21h.
First 200 beers will be free 🍻 And there will be food boards to share
party.title: Makers Party! 🎉

opening.description: Come early and choose the best seat
opening.title: Opening

closing.description: Thank you and see you next year! 👋
closing.title: Thank you!
